publication_date.title: publication date
publication_date.$comment: When the page should go live. Status must be "Published" for page to go live.

publication_end_date.title: publication end date

CMSPlugin.title: CMSPlugin
CMSPlugin.description:
The base class for a CMS plugin model. When defining a new custom plugin, you should
    store plugin-instance specific information on a subclass of this class.

    An example for this would be to store the number of pictures to display in a galery.

    Two restrictions apply when subclassing this to use in your own models:
    1. Subclasses of CMSPlugin *cannot be further subclassed*
    2. Subclasses of CMSPlugin cannot define a "text" field.

        is_editable     If False the content of the placeholder is not editable in the frontend

Style.title: Style
Style.description: Renders a given ``TAG_CHOICES`` element with additional attributes

label.title: Label
label.$comment: Overrides the display name in the structure mode.

additional_classes.title: Additional classes
additional_classes.$comment: Additional comma separated list of classes to be added to the element e.g. "row, column-12, clearfix".

width.title: Width
width.$comment: Width of the map, including the CSS length units (e.g. "100%", "400px" or "400rem").

height.title: Height
height.$comment: Height of the map, including the CSS length units (e.g. "400px" or "400rem").

style.title: Map styling
style.$comment: Provide a valid (escaped) JSON configuration. See http://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/styling

zoom_control.title: Enable zooming
zoom_control.$comment: Enabling zooming allows the user to view the map at different scales.

street_view_control.title: Enable Street View
street_view_control.$comment: Street View allows the user to see street-level imagery.

rotate_control.title: Enable rotation
rotate_control.$comment: Allows the user to change the orientation of the map.

scale_control.title: Enable map scale
scale_control.$comment: Displays a linear distance scale on the map.

fullscreen_control.title: Enable fullscreen mode
fullscreen_control.$comment: Allows the user to select a fullscreen view of the map.

pan_control.title: Enable cursor key panning
pan_control.$comment: Allows the user to move the map using the cursor keys to see new areas.

double_click_zoom.title: Enable double-click zoom
double_click_zoom.$comment: Allows the user to zoom and centre the map with a double-click or double-tap.

draggable.title: Enable dragging
draggable.$comment: Allows the user to drag the map to see new areas.

keyboard_shortcuts.title: Enable keyboard shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.$comment: Allows the user to control the map using the keyboard.

scrollwheel.title: Enable scroll-wheel zooming
scrollwheel.$comment: Allows the user to control the zoom level with a scroll-wheel.

GoogleMapMarker.title: GoogleMapMarker
GoogleMapMarker.description: Renders a marker inside the Google Maps wrapper

address.title: Full address
address.$comment: Note: Latitude and longitude can be used to fine-tune the location.

icon.title: Icon
icon.$comment: A marker icon identifies a location on a map. By default, it uses a standard image from Google.
icon.description: Foreign Key (type determined by related field)

show_content.title: Show window
show_content.$comment: Display the info window when the map loads.

info_content.title: Info window content
info_content.$comment: Will be displayed in the info window attached to the marker.

GoogleMapRoute.title: GoogleMapRoute
GoogleMapRoute.description: Renders a route option inside the map

origin.title: Starting address
origin.$comment: Will be determined by user's location (if possible) if left blank.

VideoPlayer.title: VideoPlayer
VideoPlayer.description: Renders either an Iframe when ``link`` is provided or the HTML5 <video> tag

embed_link.title: Embed link
embed_link.$comment: Use this field to embed videos from external services such as YouTube, Vimeo or others. Leave it blank to upload video files by adding nested "Source" plugins.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.$comment: Parameters are appended to the video link if provided.

poster.title: Poster
poster.description: Foreign Key (type determined by related field)

VideoSource.title: VideoSource
VideoSource.description: Renders the HTML <source> element inside of <video>.
